Class Space_Object

java.lang.Object
  Space_Object
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlackHole, Comet, Planet, Star
abstract class Space_Object
extends Object

Class Space_Object - an object that exists in a finite Universe. Space objects can be comets, stars, planets or black holes. Working in inheritance as a superclass. Movement can be initiated by repeated calls to the "move" method.

Version:
2016.03.13
Author:
Robert Topp & UP781587

                    Color objectColor,
                    Universe theUniverse)
Constructor for objects of class Space_Object

Parameters:
xPos - the horizontal coordinate of the object
yPos - the vertical coordinate of the object
xVel - the horizontal speed of the object
yVel - the vertical speed of the object
objectDiameter - the diameter (in pixels) of the object
objectColor - the color of the object
theUniverse - the universe this object is in
